Class StrategyTest

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.sort.StrategyTest
public final class StrategyTest extends Object
JUnit 4 tests for sorting strategies: SortById (ascending by id), SortByTitle (case-insensitive lexicographic order), and SortByState (ToDo < InProgress < Completed).

The suite is compatible with multiple strategy API shapes: a strategy may implement Comparator, expose sort(List&lt;ITask&gt;), or expose comparator().

    Method
    Description
    void
    sortById_ascending()
    Verifies that SortById orders tasks by ascending id.
    void
    sortById_emptyAndSingle_areStable()
    Verifies that SortById is stable for empty and single-element inputs.
    void
    sortByState_emptyAndSingle_areStable()
    Verifies that SortByState is stable for empty and single-element inputs.
    void
    sortByState_order_ToDo_InProgress_Completed()
    Verifies that SortByState orders tasks by lifecycle: ToDo, then InProgress, then Completed.
    void
    sortByTitle_emptyAndSingle_areStable()
    Verifies that SortByTitle is stable for empty and single-element inputs.
    void
    sortByTitle_lexicographic_caseInsensitive()
    Verifies that SortByTitle sorts titles case-insensitively in lexicographic order.
